trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Spartanburg
There were no other sightings in Spartanburg on or around July 4th 2013
Summary: while at work i observed a orange glowing object trailing across the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsWorking 3rd shift standing in the parking lot and looked to the south west appeared to be a bright basketball orange in color steadily streaking across the sky. The brightness remained the same no flashing just bright, no tail or sound . The direction of flight was steady and consistent. I viewed until the object traveled out of my sight. I did manage to capture a cell picture. mls
